title: Novotel Tower Bridge
text: We stayed here for 1 night in a suite and we were extremely impressed by the level of service and friendliness by all the staff, the immaculate suite that had everything we needed for our stay together with a fantastic view. The hotel is modern and clean throughout, the bar was lovely to sit in in the evening and the breakfast was lovely with, again, very attentive staff. We look forward to definitely booking again for our next trip.
